info.name: Sistem Antrian Service API
info.description: API Collection untuk Sistem Antrian Service - User Management, Email Verification & Google OAuth Login dengan response structure yang konsisten

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Redirect ke Google OAuth login page. Buka endpoint ini di browser untuk login dengan Google.
Mendapatkan informasi user yang sedang login. Requires Bearer token.
Logout dan menghapus access token. Requires Bearer token.

item.description: Endpoint untuk autentikasi menggunakan Google OAuth

query.description: Cari berdasarkan full_name, email, atau counter_name
Field untuk sorting: full_name, email, role, email_verified_at, created_at (default: created_at)
Urutan sorting: asc atau desc (default: desc)

request.description:
Mengambil data user dengan pagination, search, dan sorting.

**Query Parameters:**
- per_page: Jumlah data per halaman (default: 10)
- page: Nomor halaman (default: 1)
- search: Cari di full_name, email, atau counter_name
- sort_by: full_name, email, role, email_verified_at, created_at (default: created_at)
- sort_order: asc atau desc (default: desc)

**Response Structure:**
```json
{
  "status_code": 200,
  "success": true,
  "message": "Data user berhasil diambil",
  "data": {
    "users": [...],
    "pagination": {
      "current_page": 1,
      "per_page": 10,
      "total": 3,
      "last_page": 1,
      "from": 1,
      "to": 3
    }
  }
}
```

Membuat user baru dan mengirim email verifikasi.

**Required Fields:**
- full_name (string, max 255)
- email (string, valid email, unique)
- role (enum: admin, petugas)
- counter_id (string, must exist in counters table)
Mengambil detail user berdasarkan user_id

Update data user. Semua field bersifat optional (menggunakan validation 'sometimes').

**Optional Fields:**
- full_name
- email (akan di-check unique kecuali untuk user yang sedang diupdate)
- role
- counter_id
Partial update user - hanya update field yang dikirim
Menghapus user dari sistem

**PUBLIC ENDPOINT** - Mendapatkan daftar counter sederhana tanpa login.

**Features:**
- Tidak perlu authentication
- Tidak ada pagination
- Hanya menampilkan: counter_id, counter_name, description
- Sorted by counter_name ASC

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status_code": 200,
  "success": true,
  "message": "Data counter berhasil diambil",
  "data": [
    {
      "counter_id": "01K8SQCGXSR9C0YE95B4T2JYJE",
      "counter_name": "Administrasi",
      "description": "Loket administrasi"
    },
    {
      "counter_id": "01K8SQ1HRXACTHDX8KTRX00NMH",
      "counter_name": "Loket 1",
      "description": "Loket pelayanan umum"
    },
    {
      "counter_id": "01K8SQCGXSR9C0YE95B4T2JYJE",
      "counter_name": "Loket 3",
      "description": "Loket informasi"
    }
  ]
}
```

**Use Case:**
- Dropdown counter di kiosk ambil nomor
- Pilihan counter untuk pasien
- Display list counter di website public

query.description: Field untuk sorting: counter_name, created_at (default: created_at)
Urutan sorting: asc atau desc (default: desc)

request.description:
Mengambil data counter dengan pagination, search, dan sorting.

**Query Parameters:**
- per_page: Jumlah data per halaman (default: 10)
- page: Nomor halaman (default: 1)
- search: Cari di counter_name atau description
- sort_by: counter_name, created_at (default: created_at)
- sort_order: asc atau desc (default: desc)

**Response Structure:**
```json
{
  "status_code": 200,
  "success": true,
  "message": "Data counter berhasil diambil",
  "data": {
    "counters": [...],
    "pagination": {...}
  }
}
```

Membuat counter baru.

**Required Fields:**
- counter_name (string, max 255)

**Optional Fields:**
- description (string, nullable)
Mengambil detail counter berdasarkan counter_id

Update data counter. Semua field bersifat optional (menggunakan validation 'sometimes').

**Optional Fields:**
- counter_name
- description
Partial update counter - hanya update field yang dikirim
Menghapus counter dari sistem

item.name: Queue Management

request.description:
**PUBLIC ENDPOINT** - Pasien dapat mengambil nomor antrian tanpa login.

**Auto-Generate Queue Number:**
- Format: {LetterCode}{Number}
- LetterCode: Ditentukan dari urutan pembuatan counter (berdasarkan created_at)
  - Counter pertama dibuat → A
  - Counter kedua dibuat → B
  - Counter ketiga dibuat → C
  - Dan seterusnya...
- Number: Auto-increment per hari per counter (001, 002, 003, ...)

**Contoh:**
- Counter "Poli Anak" (dibuat pertama) → A001, A002, A003
- Counter "Poli Gigi" (dibuat kedua) → B001, B002, B003
- Counter "Poli Umum" (dibuat ketiga) → C001, C002, C003

**Required Fields:**
- counter_id (string)

**Auto-filled:**
- queue_number (generated berdasarkan urutan counter)
- status (default: waiting)

**PUBLIC ENDPOINT** - Untuk display monitor antrian (TV/Monitor) tanpa login.

**Response Structure:**
- currently_called: Array antrian yang sedang dipanggil dari semua counter
- waiting_queues: Array maksimal 8 antrian dengan status waiting (sorted by queue_number ASC)

**Use Case:**
- Display monitor di ruang tunggu
- TV antrian di loket
- Kiosk informasi antrian

**Features:**
- Menampilkan semua antrian yang sedang dipanggil (status: called)
- Menampilkan maksimal 8 antrian yang menunggu (status: waiting)
- Include relasi counter dan called_by user
- Sorted by queue_number ASC

**No Authentication Required!**

query.description: Field untuk sorting: queue_number, status, created_at, called_at (default: queue_number)
Urutan sorting: asc atau desc (default: asc)

request.description:
Mengambil data antrian dengan filter counter.

**REQUIRED:** counter_id

**Auto-Filter:**
- Hanya menampilkan status: waiting dan called
- Status done otomatis di-exclude

**Response includes:**
- currently_called: Object antrian yang sedang dipanggil (null jika tidak ada)
- queues: Array antrian (waiting + called)
- pagination: Metadata pagination

**Default Sorting:** queue_number ASC (L001, L002, L003)
Mengambil detail antrian berdasarkan queue_id

Update status antrian dengan validasi transition.

**Status Transition Rules:**
- waiting → called (only)
- called → done (only)
- done → cannot be updated (final state)

**Auto-fill saat status berubah ke 'called':**
- called_at: waktu sekarang
- called_by: user_id yang login

**Valid Status:**
- waiting
- called
- done

item.description:
Endpoint untuk mengelola antrian (Queue Management)

**Features:**
- Public endpoint untuk pasien ambil nomor
- Public endpoint untuk display monitor antrian (TV/Monitor)
- Auto-generate queue number berdasarkan counter
- Status transition validation (waiting → called → done)
- Currently called object di list endpoint

**Public Endpoints (No Auth):**
- POST /queues - Pasien ambil nomor
- GET /queues/display - Display monitor antrian

item.name: Dashboard

request.description:
Get dashboard statistics.

**Response Data:**
1. **Total Queues Today** - Number of queues created today
2. **Total Counters** - Number of counters available
3. **Total Users** - Number of registered users
4. **Average Waiting Time** - Average waiting time from created_at to called_at (in minutes)

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status_code": 200,
  "success": true,
  "message": "Dashboard statistics retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "total_queues_today": 45,
    "total_counters": 5,
    "total_users": 12,
    "average_waiting_time": {
      "value": 15.5,
      "unit": "minutes"
    }
  }
}
```

query.description: Filter: daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, all (default: daily)

request.description:
Get dashboard chart data.

**Query Parameters:**
- filter: daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, all (default: daily)

**Response Data:**
1. **Traffic Chart** - Queue traffic chart per time period
   - daily: Per hour (00:00 - 23:00)
   - weekly: Per day (last 7 days)
   - monthly: Per day (current month)
   - yearly: Per month (current year)
   - all: Per month (all time)

2. **Queue per Counter Chart** - Number of queues per counter
   - Shows total queues per counter based on filter
   - Sorted by total descending

**Response Example (daily):**
```json
{
  "status_code": 200,
  "success": true,
  "message": "Dashboard chart data retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "filter": "daily",
    "traffic_chart": [
      { "period": "08:00", "total": 5 },
      { "period": "09:00", "total": 12 },
      { "period": "10:00", "total": 18 }
    ],
    "queue_per_counter_chart": [
      { "counter_id": "...", "counter_name": "Poli Anak", "total": 25 },
      { "counter_id": "...", "counter_name": "Poli Gigi", "total": 20 },
      { "counter_id": "...", "counter_name": "Poli Umum", "total": 15 }
    ]
  }
}
```

Get queue status distribution per counter for today.

**Response Data:**
Shows the distribution of queue statuses (waiting, called, done) for each counter today.

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status_code": 200,
  "success": true,
  "message": "Queue status distribution retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "counter_id": "01K8SQ1HRXACTHDX8KTRX00001",
      "counter_name": "Poli Anak",
      "waiting": 5,
      "called": 2,
      "done": 18,
      "total": 25
    },
    {
      "counter_id": "01K8SQ1HRXACTHDX8KTRX00002",
      "counter_name": "Poli Gigi",
      "waiting": 3,
      "called": 1,
      "done": 16,
      "total": 20
    },
    {
      "counter_id": "01K8SQ1HRXACTHDX8KTRX00003",
      "counter_name": "Poli Umum",
      "waiting": 4,
      "called": 1,
      "done": 10,
      "total": 15
    }
  ]
}
```

**Use Case:**
- Monitor queue status per counter
- See how many queues are waiting, being called, or done
- Identify bottlenecks in specific counters
- Real-time counter performance monitoring

item.description:
Dashboard statistics and chart endpoints

**Features:**
- Real-time statistics (queues today, total counters, total users, avg waiting time)
- Traffic chart with custom filter (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, all)
- Queue per counter chart with custom filter
- Queue status distribution per counter (waiting/called/done)

**All endpoints are PROTECTED** - Require authentication

item.name: Email Verification

request.description:
Endpoint untuk verifikasi email user. Biasanya diakses melalui link yang dikirim ke email user.

**Response:**
- 200: Email berhasil diverifikasi atau sudah terverifikasi sebelumnya
- 400: Verifikasi gagal
- 404: User tidak ditemukan

Mengirim ulang email verifikasi ke user yang belum terverifikasi.

**Response:**
- 200: Email berhasil dikirim ulang atau email sudah terverifikasi
- 404: User tidak ditemukan

item.description: Endpoint untuk proses verifikasi email user
